mil5.2.6:1.2: ‘yo ajānanto pāṇātipātaṃ karoti, so balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavatī’ti.
mil5.2.6:1.5: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, ajānitvā pāṇātipātaṃ karonto balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavati, tena hi ‘anāpatti ajānantassā’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.
mil5.2.6:1.6: Yadi anāpatti ajānantassa, tena hi ‘ajānitvā pāṇātipātaṃ karonto balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavatī’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.
mil5.2.6:1.7: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho duruttaro duratikkamo tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.6:2.1: “Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘yo ajānanto pāṇātipātaṃ karoti, so balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavatī’ti.
mil5.2.6:2.6: Atthi, mahārāja, āpatti saññāvimokkhā, atthi āpatti nosaññāvimokkhā.
mil5.2.6:2.7: Yāyaṃ, mahārāja, āpatti saññāvimokkhā, taṃ āpattiṃ ārabbha bhagavatā bhaṇitaṃ—
